programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "American Girl Doll" - After a field trip to the American Girl Store, the designers are asked to create a modern look for a young girl, inspired by the "Beforever" American Doll collection. The designers work with young girls as their models for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Highest Bidder" - The designers are taken to a large warehouse and told that for their next challenge, they will have to bid on storage units in order to obtain their materials. The designers work in teams of two to make a two-piece cohesive collection from the materials they buy. On the second day of their two-day challenge, Tim presents the designers with the task of designing one more look. When the judges cannot decide who to eliminate on the Runway, two designers face off in a one-hour showdown.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Fashion Week: Who's In and Who's Out " - The designers are asked to create a "Street Chic" look inspired by a trip around NYC, courtesy of Lexus. They are also thrown a twist...to redesign one of the "losing looks" this season, and their sewing helper is a previously eliminated designer.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - Fashion week is just around the corner, but not before the final four designers are surprised with a trip to Rome, courtesy of Best Western. The designers join Tim in a trip of a lifetime, where they gain inspiration for their collections. Later, Tim visits each of the designers at home to check on their progress. The designers then return to NYC and present a preview of their collection to the judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 2" - The moment that our designers have been waiting and hoping for since the very beginning, the opportunity to show at New York Fashion Week, has finally arrived. With only four competitors remaining, who will ultimately have what it takes to win Project Runway?

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Reunion Special" - All of the designers reunite one last time to discuss their experiences on Project Runway together, settle any last feuds that still exist in the group, and reminisce about their time on this season. Tim Gunn hosts.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Road to the Runway" - In this season's casting special, "Road to the Runway," sixteen new designers will be introduced with a behind-the-scenes look from their casting auditions, home visits, casting submissions, and sit-down interviews. Tim Gunn will present the designers in carefully carved out categories that will lead you into the season premiere.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "It's All In The Cards" - The designers are dealt a big surprise in the first Unconventional Materials Challenge of the season! Each designer must create a wearable look using greeting cards as their main textile. Ashley Tisdale joins the judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Shut Up and Sew" - In the first Team Challenge of the season, the designers are paired up and treated to a day on a Celebrity Cruise ship. For some of the duos, the friendly seas are left behind and they hit some rocky water in the workroom. Tracee Ellis Ross guest judges.

programme.title: East
programme.desc: Alexandria is alerted after realizing someone is missing. Several search parties will venture out, but what they find isn't what they're hoping for.

programme.title: Talking Dead on "East"
programme.desc: Yvette Nicole Brown, Denise Huth & a surprise cast member discuss the episode, "East," from The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Blood In The Streets
programme.desc: A family in distress boards the Abigail. Strand branches off and his past begins to emerge. Nick searches for an associate of Strand's.

programme.title: Talking Dead: Fear the Walking Dead 204
programme.desc: Colman Domingo & Yvette Nicole Brown discuss the episode, "Blood In The Streets," from Fear The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Death Valley: Dante's View
programme.desc: Balthazar Getty and Norman Reedus spend a night in Las Vegas and then ride out to Death Valley, enjoying the epic scenery.

programme.title: The Making Of Season 4 of The Walking Dead: Volume 1
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with the cast and creators for an Inside look at how season four was created. Season 4, Episodes 1 to 5.

programme.title: Friday Night In with The Morgans: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Morgans check in with their friends Mark Duplass and Katie Aselton, Colman Domingo, a local community organizer, plus a viewer at home, all appearing via video chat.

programme.title: East
programme.desc: Alexandria is alerted after realizing someone is missing. Several search parties will venture out, but what they find isn't what they're hoping for.

programme.title: Talking Dead on "East"
programme.desc: Yvette Nicole Brown, Denise Huth & a surprise cast member discuss the episode, "East," from The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Blood In The Streets
programme.desc: A family in distress boards the Abigail. Strand branches off and his past begins to emerge. Nick searches for an associate of Strand's.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Hercules Reborn
programme.desc: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage inspires Hercules. Together, they fight to rescue the bride and reclaim Hercules' honor.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E11 | Baton Rouge
programme.desc: In the search for a serial killer in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, police aren't impressed by psychic Jeanne Borgen's visions until one of the victims' neighbors reports seeing a peeping tom who could match her description of the killer.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E12 | Jacqueline Poole
programme.desc: Psychic Christine Holohan helps police with clues to the death of young Jacqueline Poole, who was assaulted and strangled in her home.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Revolutions
programme.desc: Revolutions in AI technology will soon become common but the real revolution will be if robots choose to revolt against themselves or humans.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Bad Tech
programme.desc: Explore how a dependence on technology can lead to some unfortunate and unexpected events.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E5 | Trouble's Brewing
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E6 | Powerless
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E7 | First Contact
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E8 | Finale
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E1 | Into the Great Beyond... Beyond
programme.desc: Young Stewart Lipinski is made captain of an exploratory space mission into space...his older sister Karen is made his second in command, and is none too happy about it. When their ship and crew stumble into a different universe with no way home, Stewart and Karen have to figure out their differences in order to survive.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E2 | Getting to Know You
programme.desc: In an attempt to raise the morale of his frightened and fudge-riddled crew, Stewart initiates a bonding session that devolves into ice-breaker games. When Karen discovers that one of the crew members is actually an alien who's implanted memories in their heads, they play a high-stakes game of Mafia to weed out the intruder.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E13 | Mark Green
programme.desc: Psychic Diane Lazarus helps a woman find the murderers of her nephew.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E14 | Lawrence Mbroh
programme.desc: Psychic Investigators reports on a missing person's case, reenacting the events that lead to the disappearance of a well-liked drug dealer. Lawrence Mbroh's father contacts Detective Pam Gray to report his son missing.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E15 | Rosa Talamantes
programme.desc: Jo claims that he and his girlfriend, Rosa Talamantes, went out for drinks and that she left him alone at a bar on the day of her disappearance. The problem with Jo's story is that Rosa would never have left her five children at home by themselves.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E1 | Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Psychic Georgia Rudolph believes that the missing wife of an Ohio state trooper has been murdered. Skeptic investigators become believers when the psychic's visions are confirmed and lead to a shocking arrest.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E2 | A Killer Among Us
programme.desc: Psychic Phil Jordan leads investigators to the door of the person he thinks murdered a Georgia roofer in his bed two years before.

programme.title: Noel
programme.desc: Joy is just around the corner when Susan Sarandon, Penelope Cruz, Paul Walker, and Alan Arkin fill out an all-star cast in this holiday classic. As five strangers come together on Christmas Eve, a story of peace, companionship, comfort, love, and healing unfolds against the backdrop of New York City. Noel, with its stunning cast and inspirational story, proves miracles are closer than you think.

programme.title: Lil Yachty vs Conceited in a Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

programme.title: Allen Iverson Reminds Us Why He's The Best Dressed NBA Player Ever | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown," we're live from ComplexCon 2019 in Long Beach with special guest and NBA style legend Allen Iverson! In addition to discussing which NBA players were the best and worst dressed of the week, we take a look at some of A.I's past fits while in the league and discuss the influence he still has on current player's fashion. Iverson also tells stories about the backlash he received for not sticking to the NBA's former uniform dress code, plus more!

programme.title: James Harden's Cozy Fit Costs as Much as a New Car | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this episode of 'Tunnel Takedown,' the hosts talk PJ Tucker's latest outfit, how players tone down their fits in smaller cities, the '90s Starter jacket trend still being in style today, and Racks Hogan explains his beef with Amiri. They even try to guess the costs of outfits from superstars like James Harden and Ben Simmons. The numbers may surprise you.

programme.title: NikeStories vs Nick Engvall in a Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

In one corner we have Drew Hammell, also known as NikeStories, and in the other corner we have founder of "Sneaker History" and veteran writer in the sneaker blog space, Nick Engvall. These two go head to head in a versatile five round battle! We get to see some classic gems, we haven't seen in a while. Check it out for yourselves and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: Twojskicks vs SBCollector in a Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we put two sneaker boutique owners against one another in an extreme battle of rare sample gems! Jaysse Lopez aka Twojskicks of Urban Necessities goes up against Chris Robinson aka SBCollector of Branded Skate Shop in Long Branch, New Jersey! The amount of sample sneakers shown on this episode is amazing! Watch the episode and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: NBA Champion Matt Barnes Reveals His Worst Dressed Teammate | Tunnel Takedown

programme.title: Kelly Oubre Channels His Rockstar Energy while Chris Paul's Fit Flops | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown" discusses players like PJ Tucker experimenting with patterns and new brands, Kelly Oubre's latest rockstar fit, overalls having a comeback thanks to players like Russell Westbrook, and the problem with wearing too many graphics at once. Our host Matt Barnes even takes a look at some fits from his playing days.

programme.title: Joe La Puma Breaks Down How To Pair Sneakers with Your Fits | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Joe La Puma joins the panel this week for the season two finale to discuss how to find the perfect pair of sneakers to pair with your outfit. The hosts also crown their best dressed players of the season so far, and discuss the personal styles of NBA superstars like LeBron James and Giannis Antetokounmpo. Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also give their picks for the worst tunnel outfits of the year thus far.

programme.title: Marcus Jordan Says New Air Jordan Project Is On The Way | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Son of NBA legend Michael Jordan, Marcus, stops by this week on 'Tunnel Takedown.' He teases an upcoming Air Jordan project with his store Trophy Room coming in 2020, and gives his thoughts on the latest fits from stars like Kemba Walker and PJ Tucker. Host Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also discuss Carmelo Anthony's style to celebrate his recent return to the NBA and roast some more of the league's most flagrant fits.

programme.title: Racks Loses It Over Russell Westbrook and JaVale McGee Needs a Shirt | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week, Racks Hogan, Mouse Jones and Kalysse Anthony break down their favorite looks of the week and get into a heated discussion over Russell Westbrook. Plus, renowned stylist Derek Roche previews the upcoming style trend while on the set of French Montana's new video. Then, Kalysse walks us through the do's and don'ts of Dopp kits and the hosts go in on JaVale McGee's bold fit.

programme.title: TMarkGotKickss Vs WhoisHeck In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we are putting two acquaintances against one another. In one corner we have the Chief Operating Officer of PrivateLabelNYC, Hector Aponte, taking on the outfit grid king, Terrel Marcus aka TMarkGotKickss! Both battlers displayed a wide variety of hyped and exclusive sneakers you won't see often! Check out the episode and let us know who won this battle?!

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Allen Ginsberg is a poet, counter-culture adventurer and chronicler of the Beat Generation. In his famously confessional style, Ginsberg recounts his life and search for personal liberation that led to the most timeless and electrifying work of his career, the poem HOWL. Meanwhile, in a San Francisco courtroom, HOWL is on trial. Prosecutor Ralph McIntosh sets out to prove that the book should be banned, while defense attorney Jake Ehrlich argues for freedom of speech and creative expression.

programme.title: Hot Trash
programme.desc: S1 E1 | D'Arcy dishes the dirt about the Capitol Insurrection, Pence's fly, and much, much, more! D'Arcy dishes the dirt about Armie Hammer, Sex and the City, #BussitChallenge, and more!

programme.title: Dykes, Camera, Action!
programme.desc: Lesbians didn't always get to see themselves on screen, but over time they built visibility and transformed the social imagination about queerness. Filmmakers Barbara Hammer, Su Friedrich, Rose Troche, Cheryl Dunye, Desiree Akhavan, film critic B. Ruby Rich, and others share moving and often hilarious stories from their lives and discuss how they've expressed queer identity through film.

programme.title: Greetings From Fire Island
programme.desc: Greetings from Fire Island is a documentary that captures the natural beauty and history of a long wisp of land off the coast of Long Island's south shore.

programme.title: Sink Sank Sunk
programme.desc: Sink Sank Sunk is a digital triptych that tells the story of Cooper, a young gay recluse with some unresolved mommy issues. In this Revry Original digital series, Cooper journeys to complete his late-mother's passion project, a documentary about her synchronized swimming team, venturing into the unfamiliar waters of community, empathy, and romantic love. Sink Sank Sunk is a tender and playful meditation on being a part of something bigger than yourself.

programme.title: Smothered
programme.desc: S1 E1-7 | Jason Stuart (The Birth Of A Nation) and Mitch Hara (Mutant Olive) have co-written, starred & produced their own series "Smothered". They are harnessing their unique talents, baggage and humanness to express their joint insanity. This black comedy shines a glaring light on Randy (Hara) & Ralph (Stuart), a longtime gay couple who cannot stand each other... but can't afford to get divorced.

programme.title: 1 Million Happy Nows
programme.desc: The story of Lainey and Eva's changing relationship as they struggle to deal with the diagnosis of Lainey's Early Onset Alzheimer's.

programme.title: The Billionaire
programme.desc: A gender-swapped independent film adaptation of George Bernard Shaw's classic play 'The Millionairess', transposed into a contemporary context of Gay Marriage and Asexuality, THE BILLIONAIRE follows a haughty and prudish young billionaire's quest for love, despite all the odds. The film is a throwback to Classic Hollywood films, stylistically and tonally.

programme.title: Miami Blues
programme.desc: Fred Ward, Alec Baldwin and Jennifer Jason Leigh star in this deliciously offbeat black comedy. Veteran criminal Frederick Frenger, Jr. (Alec Baldwin) has moved to Miami to get a fresh start... at robbing a whole new set of people. But when his wife (Jennifer Jason Leigh) begins to suspect his criminal behavior, and a denture-wearing, obsessed cop (Fred Ward) begins to close in, he will need a lot more than luck and a bogus badge to escape a crossfire hotter than the barrel of a smoking gun!

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 1" - Six couples compete in a variety of stunts while living together in the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 2" - Contestants must live together and compete in and around the "Psycho" house and the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 3" - Couples in straitjackets must eat live camel-spiders, and a home invasion in Dallas.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Family Fear Factor - Universal Orlando" - A parent must jump out of a helicopter 200 feet in the air, while the offspring goes down a 100-foot-long zipline, and a test of the contestants' acrobatic skills.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Blind Date Fear Factor" - Contestants pair up with complete strangers to manoeuvre a speeding boat beneath a helicopter and escape a small cage submerged in freezing water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Old Vs Young Fear Factor" - Two 20-something teams take on two couples more than twice their age in a tug-of-war 100 feet in the air and a competition to drive a car onto a flatbed truck as it barrels down the highway.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Disaster Fear Factor" - With challenges such as facing hurricane-force rain and wind at 100 feet in the air, eating cockroaches, and battling a flash flood.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Crane Cannon Launch/Trash Scavenger Hunt/Heli Body Drag" - This episode featured four pairs as teams. First, it's the human cannonball. As a truck drives along a pier with a crane hanging off the side, one team member hangs from a crane and then into the water they light the fuse to giant cannon. Their partner is shot out of the cannon and into the water, swim to a boat and clip a flag to a flagpole. The team to finish fastest chooses team to be eliminated. Next, it's a trash can buffet scavenger hunt. Teams dig through dumpsters and barrels to find items. The team to match four items fastest would win a four-day trip to Las Vegas and $20,000. No one would be eliminated. The final stunt is a real drag. Team members hanging on to handlebars attached to a helicopter and are dragged across pavement on their stomachs. They have to let go as close to the finish line as possible. The team to get the least combined distance from the finish line would win $50K. The home invasion stunt goes to Dubuque, Iowa.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Couples" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Mother/Son Fear Factor" - Mothers must balance on their son's shoulders while on a ledge 100 feet in the air the teams navigate through a kitchen filled with obstacles.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the 'Last Chance Saloon' special's episode. Contestants take on four hard and tough games with the western films' sound effects and the accompaniment of Amanda Byram and Richard Hammond. They also welcome back favourites from the previous four series such as Man Mountain Syed, Rock God John and Total Wipeout's most famous couple 'Charlardo'.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Twenty foolhardy Brits attempt to conquer the purpose-built obstacle course in Argentina. Contestants face different games like The Qualifier, The Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and The Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: In this episode, contestants face different games like The Qualifier, The Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and The Wipeout Zone. As always, they start with twenty competitors, but only twelve of them will pass to the second round.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Richard Hammond hosts another episode of TV's stupidest, brightest and most insane game show. In this series, the obstacles have been made bigger and brasher than ever, ensuring bigger bumps, crunches, smashes, and splashes.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Twenty contestants take on one of television's largest and most extreme obstacle courses in order to win 10,000 pounds and get to 'The Final'.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Richard's co-host Amanda Byram is course-side in Buenos Aires as 20 foolhardy Brits tackle the purpose-built Argentinian course. There is a 10,000 pound prize for the winner and the additional plaudit of being crowned the Total Wipeout champion. To get there all the winner has to do is master the Sucker Punch, the Big Red Balls, Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: In this episode, twenty intrepid contestants – male and female, young and old, fit and not-so-fit – take on four grueling, but wildly funny obstacle courses to win the title of the seventh Wipeout Champion and the grand cash prize.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Throughout this season, contestants have fallen, bounced and swung to win the prize, but only seven of them could achieve it. This is the last episode of the season and the seven previous winners compete to be crowned Champion of Champions. This time they face games like The Qualifier, The Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and The Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: TRP S4:E30 GOLIATH Groupers & Florida Water Issues - FullScale Outdoors
programme.desc: This week I had the chance to sit down with Dale Luginbill of FullScale Outdoors podcast to talk about a number of controversial issues going on in Florida right now. The first of these is the debate on harvesting Goliath grouper. We dig into the positives and negatives of a harvest and expression our opinions. We also discuss the red tide that is taking place in Tampa Bay right now. Is it natural, or something that we have caused. We discuss all of this in today’s show.

programme.title: Mocking Up a New 1974 Bronco

programme.title: ’65 C10 Rewind 2
programme.desc: With a fully rebuilt 292 straight-six under the hood, we finish up our patina classic in time to put on some road miles, and check out James Otto’s ’66 C10 built in an entirely different way.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: You say hotdishes, Frankie says casserole. Either way, these one-pot hotdishes are an affordable way to feed a group of people, or the family for dinner. Plus they're great to freeze for future meals. Frankie's secret is to use a combination of frozen and fresh ingredients to keep these hotdishes nutritious and cost-effective.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: You don't have to travel half way around the world to try a different cuisine - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus it's delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Dried beans are the most affordable and healthy way to prepare them, with very little effort to boot. Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. We also take a field trip to the grocery store to shop the bulk aisle where those dried beans live. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so don’t be scared to eat too many. Remember, they’re good for your heart.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie makes street food at home. It's fresher, healthier, and cheaper! Then - get ready! - because you've never seen rice like this before.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you don’t have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways to avoid food waste.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and you’ll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchen’s best-kept secret weapon – the pantry.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25. Game days aren’t for dinner parties but they are a day for some fan-favorite finger foods, especially those you can make in advance. Frankie makes three no-fuss appetizers that are cheaper, healthier, and tastier than subpar game day take out. Plus it’s an easy and affordable party to host. So gather around with friends and cheer on your favorite teams. Or just eat. Both are a win.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Juan Pablo cooks traditional Venezuelan recipes.

programme.title: Pork Chops and Oven Fries
programme.desc: In this episode, test cook Elle Simone makes Bridget the ultimate Deviled Pork Chops. Then tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of dark chocolate chips, and gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews kids' oven mitts. Science expert Dan Souza reveals the science behind non-Newtonian fluids, and test cook Lan Lam makes the perfect Thick-Cut Oven Fries.

programme.title: Weekend Brunch
programme.desc: Our sour cream coffee cake and light, flavorful fruit salads transform weekend brunch into an indulgent meal.

programme.title: Party Foods
programme.desc: Who doesn't like a plate of good nachos or Buffalo wings? We discover when you can use supermarket products versus when only good, fresh ingredients will do. A simple, sweet-tart sangria finishes our party menu.

programme.title: New Orleans Menu
programme.desc: Watch as we figure out the best recipes for two New Orleans favorites-Jambalaya and bananas Foster.

programme.title: Truck Stop Favorites
programme.desc: Truckers often know where to find the best home-style cooking. After long days on the road, most would rather tuck into real food, prepared from scratch, than the prefab fast-food fare. And what could be better than chicken-fried steak with cream gravy and real coconut cream pie?

programme.title: Grill-Roasted Beef Tenderloin
programme.desc: On occasion we break the bank and buy a beef tenderloin. The tender, buttery interior is the big draw, and the combination of a healthy dose of seasoning and the flavor from the charcoal grill is a perfect solution to an otherwise mild-tasting piece of meat.

programme.title: More Italian Classics
programme.desc: Pasta all'amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. This simple dish is about the details, and we knew they could be mastered.

programme.title: Chicken Two Ways
programme.desc: When you eat chicken frequently, it pays to have a number of preparations on hand. In this episode, we turn to orange-flavored chicken and chicken teriyaki.

programme.title: Let's Talk Turkey
programme.desc: Thanksgiving can strike fear into the heart of even the most proficient cook. First, there's the turkey to contend with-in no other meal is the main course paraded in front of guests with as much fanfare. Sweet potato casserole is often considered another must-have. With our recipes for these Thanksgiving standards, we minimize the work so that the cook can enjoy the holiday as much as everyone else.

programme.title: Lighter Family Favorites
programme.desc: Whether we admit it or not, there are some dishes that, while tasty, are just too high in fat and calories to be enjoyed on a regular basis. Even a modest portion of macaroni and cheese or chicken Parmesan is prohibitive. But that doesn't need to be the case.

programme.title: Chicken Kiev
programme.desc: Commonly found in banquet halls and at catered events, this once-highbrow dish has become a bit of a joke. But after preparing several cookbook versions, we realized that pairing a crisp-fried coating with a delicately flavored butter sauce was a great idea that deserved a revival.

programme.title: Beef Dressed Up
programme.desc: Test cook Christie Morrison shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make perfect Spice-Crusted Steaks. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick of electric griddles. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of supermarket bacon. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore and Julia reveal a showstopping recipe for Grilled Bacon Burgers with Caramelized Onion.

programme.title: Chicken and Cornbread
programme.desc: Test cook Natalie Estrada prepares Cast Iron Baked Chicken with host Bridget Lancaster. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Julia Collin Davison to a tasting of hot sauce. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Julia how to make foolproof Blueberry Cornbread with Honey Butter.

programme.title: The Italian American Kitchen
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore reveals the secrets to achieving the ultimate Sausage Ragu in a time crunch. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a fettuccine taste test. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison how to make a spectacular Fluffy Baked Polenta with Red Sauce.

programme.title: Bourbon and Broccoli Hit the Grill
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison fires up the grill for host Bridget Lancaster, demonstrating the ultimate Grilled Bourbon Steak recipe. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of Dill Pickle Spears. Then, test cook Ashley Moore prepares an unforgettable Grilled Broccoli with Lemon and Parmesan. Finally, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews inexpensive options for Instant-Read Thermometers.

programme.title: Ultimate Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster revive a traditional recipe for Wellesley Fudge Cake. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for immersion blenders. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof makes Bridget a Southern specialty, Chicken and Pastry.

programme.title: Tex-Mex Favorites
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make a Lone Star State classic-Flank Steak in Adobo. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for inexpensive blenders. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Julia how to make the ultimate Texas Breakfast Tacos.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Nuts
programme.desc: Beyond the snack table, use nuts in Spaghetti Squash Salad with walnuts, Grilled Shrimp and Almonds and Fennel Salad with Walnuts.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Home Cooking
programme.desc: No time? No problem! Martin proves you don’t need to spend hours in the kitchen to make a great, home-cooked meal.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - Brome Modern Eatery Coop Caribbean Fusion Otus Supply
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Nathan Hochstein, Mari Nafsou and Mary Burkhardt, who review melt-in-your-mouth burgers and other favorites at the Brome Modern Eatery signature Caribbean and Asian specialties from celebrity Chef Max Hardy at the Coop Caribbean Fusion and upscale eats of pork, fish, boar and more at Otus Supply.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Macaroni and Cheese
programme.desc: Graham shows how to create a golden sweet potato-cheese puree that’s perfect for macaroni noodles or broccoli and cauliflower au gratin.

programme.title: Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Tiki Party
programme.desc: Roy and Chuck enjoy an afternoon of research for a 'Tiki' themed backyard party. An unpredictable afternoon of tropical bliss ensues when they visit the Tommy Bahama Bar, the La Mariana Yacht Club, Alan Wong's Pineapple Room, and the famous Halekulani for Mai Tais, pineapple martinis and laughter. Chuck also joins Roy in the kitchen to prepare his succulent lamb chop pupu.

programme.title: Justin Wilson's Easy Cookin' - Elbow Macaroni Salad & Chili Jambalaya
programme.desc: Join Justin as he demonstrates how to prepare and cook Elbow Macaroni Salad & Chili Jambalaya!

programme.title: What's For Dinner? Poached Swordfish
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking poached swordfish, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: A Taste of History - Cuisine of the Equator
programme.desc: Chef Staib travels to the highlands of Ecuador where local ingredients and indigenous culture combine with that of the Spanish conquistadors to create something truly unique. Recipes like cuy, cevichocho, and helados de paila are prepared by local chefs.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Food Defines Family
programme.desc: Chef Charles Phan is the visionary behind San Francisco’s renowned Slanted Door. Chef and his kids head to the coast where farmer Joe Schirmer is harvesting unique Asian ingredients. The family gathers and sells, together at the Farm Market. Then, back in the kitchen the chef and his kids whip up Vietnamese, Thai, and Chinese specialties with an all American twist.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Kimchi Chronicles Begin
programme.desc: An introduction to the basics of Korean cooking starting with, of course, kimchi. Jean-Georges and Marja are joined in the kitchen by their real-life neighbors, actors Hugh and Deb Jackman. Together they prepare two iconic Korean dishes—bibimbap and beef bulgogi and check out barbeque that can rival Texas.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Will Greenwood, Thierry Rautureau, and Lisa Anderson
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Scallop Salad, Sturgeon on a Citrus-Tomato Stew, and Pineapple Brown Sugar Crisp. Restaurants include: Sunset Grill in Nashville, Rover’s in Seattle, and Gerard’s Downtown in New Orleans.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations - Chile

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations - Thailand
programme.desc: The Thai cuisine blends five fundamental flavors: sweet, spicy, sour, bitter and salty. To experience each of these tastes, Tony explores the bustling streets of Bangkok and immerses himself in the local street foods, cultural practices, and people.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations - Obsessed

programme.title: Verdad Oculta: Episodio 43
programme.desc: Después de la caída de un infame narco-líder, el coronel Diana está lista para tomarse un descanso de la policía y trabajar para arreglar su matrimonio. Su jefe, sin embargo, tiene otros planes y le asigna al coronel Diana su mayor misión hasta la fecha: desmantelar "el Clan del Norte" dirigido por los hermanos Zurria y sus aliados oficiales corruptos y funcionarios del gobierno.

programme.desc: Cuando tres es multitud.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar es un drama épico ambientado en el siglo XVI que relata la historia sobre un matrimonio político de conveniencia entre un emperador mogol, Akbar y una princesa Rajput, Jodha Bai. La trama se centra en cómo éste matrimonio político trae el amor entre ellos en una medida que cambió el destino de la India, así mismo retrata las guerras de ese tiempo junto con las relaciones entre los mogoles y los Rajputs. Gran parte de la historia recrea el funcionamiento de las instituciones icónicas de la época como las reinas, los tribunales, las cortesanas, los ministros y su influencia en la historia de amor de Akbar y Jodha Bai. La serie también destaca cómo el Emperador Mogol Jalaluddin adquiere el título de Akbar del pueblo.

programme.title: Me Caíste Del Cielo
programme.desc: Una tragi-comedia en la que un hombre rescata al dueño de una taquería, quien se encuentra en inminente riesgo

programme.title: Detrás De Las Cámaras
programme.desc: Programa de investigación narrado por personajes que han marcado el mundo del entretenimiento venezolano. Acompáñenos a revivir las experiencias y anécdotas más memorables.

programme.title: Donde No Hay Luz
programme.desc: Ahí donde las inseguridades de Andrés se esconden, donde su ira se hospeda, vivirá su esposa Gabriela.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Cada año cientos de mujeres caen en las redes de reclutadores que trafican con personas, viéndose forzadas a una vida de esclavitud sexual y laboral. Esta es la historia de Ana, Frida y Seleni, tres bellas jóvenes, engañadas bajo la promesa de alcanzar la vida soñada. Inocentes y vulnerables, con la férrea convicción de que pese a las condiciones adversas en las que viven, pueden alcanzar un mejor futuro, serán engañadas y utilizadas por personas inescrupulosas que las adentrarán en una red de prostitución de la que no podrán escapar.

programme.title: Sofía

programme.title: Los Pre-Universitarios
programme.desc: Un grupo de chicos, que con la presión de los estudios descubren lo Importante que hay en sus vidas.

programme.title: As One

programme.title: Hidden Identity EP05
programme.desc: Investigation Squad 5 realizes the presence of 'Ghost' and begins a new undercover operation. At the moment squad 5, with the perfect disguise, gets closer to a clue to the incident, a dead body of a foreigner is found and the incident is thrown into chaos again. To make matters worse, Minju, who has been carrying operation, is in danger of losing her life.

programme.title: Hidden Identity EP06
programme.desc: Squad 5 solves the case with faith in each other, but the conflict deepens between NIS director Dae-hyun and Moo-won. Dae-hyun makes an irresistible suggestion with bait for Tae-in's obsession toward 'Ghost', and Tae-in is at a crossroads of fate for squad 5. Meanwhile, hostile forces who regard the existence of squad 5 as eyesore appear to pressure Mu-won.

programme.title: Hidden Identity EP07
programme.desc: Squad 5 is confused by Mu-won who suddenly became a criminal. Gun-woo and his team go undercover to reveal the truth of the beleaguered leader, Mu-won. Meanwhile, Tae-in is shocked to hear the news of a man who changed Gun-woo and Tae-in's life eight years ago.

programme.title: Hidden Identity EP08

programme.title: Jason Love - Jokes On Me
programme.desc: One of today's busiest comics, Jason Love has appeared on HBO, Comedy Central, America's Got Talent, and over 20 national broadcasts.Jason works clean and incorporates music, making him a favorite for companies like Google, Chevron, Farmers, and Costco.Says L.A. Weekly: "Jason Love is comedy that brings people together."From the Hollywood Improv to Carolines on Broadway, Jasons audience continues to grow. He has performed overseas for the troops and on the seas for cruise lines. Jason was a finalist at the Cabo Comedy Festival and at the World Series of Comedy in Vegas.Jasons non-profit, Love &amp Laughter, brings free shows to cancer support communities and others in need. His podcast is produced by Levity Entertainment. He is represented by Don Casino Productions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Shayne Smith - Prison for Wizards
programme.desc: Former Gang Member, current comedian, future famous comedian. Shayne Smith is the runner up in the Wiseguys’ 2015 Funniest Person In Utah competition, winner of the 2015 Salt City Comedy Superstar contest and most recently voted best Alternative Comedian of 2016 by City Weekly.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Andrew Hobbs - A Joke Unless it Works
programme.desc: Have you ever, as an adult, been bullied by a healthcare professional or popular middle school girl? Andrew has. The comedy of Andrew Hobbs encapsulates the bizarre awkwardness of belated maturity and his attempts to appear in control. Andrew will have you rolling with laughter as he twists a narrative of humor and heart from his own life experiences and observations. His comedy has been featured in comedy festivals across the country. He has been perfecting his craft since childhood and throughout adulthood.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Eric O Shea - Life: It's Not Your Fault
programme.desc: Eric O'Shea has been active in the comedy business for 25 years. He has performed in L.A. with Betty White at the Creative Emmy Awards and has appeared on America's Got Talent TV Show. Every year since 1997, Eric has performed an average of 70 shows a year, and has received 7 nominations as the “National College Comedian of the Year”

programme.title: Dwight Slade - Animal Cracker
programme.desc: Part man, part ageless boy comedian Dwight Slade has the privilege of being a comedy legend in American stand up. The winner of this year's Boston Comedy Festival, Slade combines an intelligent, raging voice of justice with the snickering attitude of a high school prankster. He gives the impression of a man on a journey. Who enjoys nothing more than making fun of everything along the way. Born in Seattle, Dwight moved often in his early years, living in San Mateo, California Wilton, Connecticut Marietta, Georgia and Houston, Texas.

programme.title: Will Marfori - Eat Your Vegetables
programme.desc: Will Marfori has appeared on the Late, Late Show with Craig Ferguson and is a regular on Sirius/XM Satellite radio. Performing at comedy clubs, colleges, and cruise ships, Will tours almost 50 weeks a year all around the world. Born with Cerebral Palsy, Will never felt like he fit in until he walked on stage for the first time in 1999. He started doing comedy in Norfolk, Virginia while attending Old Dominion University. He entered a stand-up comedy contest for the student body and won. He was hooked. Poking fun at his situation was empowering and it felt good to share his comedy with other people. In 2001 Will graduated from ODU and got a job working as a house MC at the Comedy Zone in Norfolk, Virginia.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jason Russell - Beige Frosty
programme.desc: Like most comedians, finding a way to be silly in class was a way to get attention from classmates and teachers! Some teachers were amused others had no sense of humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Lisa Mills - This is My Real Accent
programme.desc: Lisa Mills is an Atlanta based, award-winning comedian, speaker, and author. Her acting debut was working alongside network television’s favorite military gal, Catherine Bell on the Lifetime Channels hit show, Army Wives.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Moody McCarthy - The Good Jew
programme.desc: Moody was born “Matthew” in Syracuse, NY, into a rambunctious household with six siblings. (They're Irish...somebody had to get a nickname.) He began doing comedy in 1992 and was soon hired by Syracuse’s top morning radio show to cover sports and write jokes, his first loves. After six years of working the road, Moody moved to New York City. This millennium has been good to Moody: he’s also been featured on Last Comic Standing, Star Search (the 2003 reboot), and America’s Got Talent. He’s a regular at the best clubs in the land (including the world famous Comedy Cellar) and can be heard on SiriusXM. Moody’s material is described as original but universal, and smart without being trite. Couple that with a disarming stage presence & in-the-moment chops, you’ll see why he’s earned the admiration of his peers for his ability to “go up cold” and turn any setting into a hot room. From corporate outings to pubs, this versatile performer will brighten any event.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tim Wilkins - Password Protected
programme.desc: Today that dream is more alive than ever as he is a 20-year veteran stand-up comedian, TV and radio personality, speaker and writer, who has performed on stages around the world. He has entertained millions in legendary venues ranging from Radio City Music Hall to chow halls in Afghanistan, to colleges, casinos and cruise ships.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Doug Thompson - Who Taught You What?
programme.desc: With a different look on the everyday life, and the ability to find positive funny analogies on the pitfalls of it all comedian Doug Thompson is a ray of light. He became an opening act for "The Impractical Jokers" from Tru Tv hit show and has never look

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: DC Benny - You Don't Look Funny
programme.desc: Benny lives in Brooklyn where he fiddles around with old Land Rovers when he is supposed to be helping his wife run her natural skincare business. He has a dog named Grits and two cats who prefer that he not share their personal information in this bio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Larry Omaha - Freaky Times in a Freaky World
programme.desc: Omaha’s insightful view on multi-ethnic America has garnered him numerous tv appearances and places him in great demand. His stories are hailed by the Los Angeles Times as "Refreshing , funny and universal." His side-splitting jabs at the hypocrisy of Am

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Bob Zany - I Think I Handled That Well
programme.desc: He simply reaches into a bottomless grab bag of jokes, so smooth and effortless that it would be easy to overlook just how much talent and skill is behind the process'"

programme.title: Paul Rodriguez: The Here and Wow
programme.desc: Veteran comedian, Paul Rodriguez hits the stage to give you his perspectives on life.

programme.title: Caleb Elliott: Diary of a Smooth Black Kid
programme.desc: One of DryBar's youngest comics, Caleb Elliot proves that age is anything but a setback.

programme.title: Kabir Singh: Retiring Material
programme.desc: Kabir Singh is a huge crowd-pleaser with an abundance of energy, an in-your-face attitude, and clever material.

programme.title: Bone Hampton: It Is What It Is
programme.desc: As down home as collards and cornbread, and as funny as a possum in a petticoat, Bone Hampton is a master at making audiences feel like family.

programme.title: Kellen Erskine: Composed
programme.desc: Kellen Erskine was featured on season 7 of NBC's America's Got Talent. His jokes have appeared in many publications including the Reader's Digest.

programme.title: Chris Schlichting: Catch and Dress a Squirrel
programme.desc: Chris Schlichting comes with a few crucial warnings: Beware of birthday wishes, day raccoons, and the spelling on all hand written love letters.

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Hangar 18
programme.desc: Hangar 18 tells the story of a vast cover-up involving a crashed UFO, and lots and lots of mustaches.This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Matthew J. Elliot and Ian Potter from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Shake Hands With Danger
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this safety short Shake Hands With Danger! Mike, Kevin and Bill have never shaken hands with Danger, but they did give Danger that "fist bump then explosion" thing, and then Danger called them all "Bro-seph."

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Sons Of Hercules
programme.desc: Everyone knows Hercules (or Heracles, if you’re really fun to talk to at parties), the mighty Greek whose heroic exploits included cleaning up tons of horse crap. But not everyone knows his sons, who for some reason went by the name The Sons of Hercules! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Sons of Hercules!

programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the Oscar nominated short People Soup! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill as they serve up a hilarious bowl of People Soup!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Merlin The Return
programme.desc: Merlin, the legendary wizard is stuck inside a terrible nether dimension. Meanwhile, the former stars of Wayne’s World, Highlander, and The Young Ones are stuck in a terrible movie about Merlin, the legendary wizard. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Calendar: How to Use It

programme.title: RIFFTRAX LIVE - Christmas Shorts-stravaganza

This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Babysitter
programme.desc: She watches television. She gives your child watered-down tomato soup. She puts your child to bed two hours earlier than needed. She talks on the phone. She plays record albums too loud. She is... THE BABYSITTER! She won’t be stopped. She can’t be stopped. But Bridget and Mary Jo will try to route the evil unleashed by THE BABYSITTER!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Karate Cop
programme.desc: John Travis (Ron Marchini) is back! Who? You know, the guy from Omega Cop? Played a cop, possibly the Omega Cop? Well he’s back! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.desc: Laugh and learn with Gecko and the mechanicals at Gecko's Garage.

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party -Episode 2
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe - The Fangpyres - to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok - Episode 103
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV...maybe they can "mod" that for their own, "knightly" use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling...in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. "Of course I'm the leader...I'm a Richmond."

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: Newbie and The Disasternauts

programme.title: Everybody Loves a Moose
programme.desc: An oddball buddy series between an over ambitious boy, Jack and his pal Moose, a melodramatic self-confessed expert in everything. Except he isn't! Despite his best intentions, he always messes up and although Jack may not get what he want, you can't help being sucked in by Moose's relentless optimism and zest for life!

programme.title: Gummibar & Friends - The Gummy Bear Show
programme.desc: Gummy lives in an apartment with his friend Harry the Chameleon, while his other friend Kala the Cat hangs out in a ninja dojo on the roof. Together they go on wild and wacky adventures in their building and hometown. Enjoy the fun and crazy adventures!

programme.title: Zig & Sharko

programme.title: Oggy and The Cockaroaches
programme.desc: What’s blue and sweet and soft all over? Oggy! And he would be the most carefree cat in the world if three nasty little cockroaches hadn’t set up home in his house: Joey, Deedee and Marky, they’re dumb, ugly and mean and all they want to do is ruin Oggy’s life! It’s fast, explosive and hilarious…it’s Oggy and the Cockroaches!

programme.title: Guinness World Records
programme.desc: We’re Guinness World Records – the people who measure the most amazing things, and make records official. If you want to be surprised and impressed, sit back and enjoy some incredible talent and achievements.

programme.title: Angry Birds

programme.title: The Day Henry Met

programme.title: Bubu and the Little Owls
programme.desc: Follow the adorable adventures of Bubu, a curious and energetic young owl who is always in a hurry to explore the world outside her shell!

programme.title: TOONBO

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, t

programme.title: Sing-Along Songs
programme.desc: Sing-Along Songs: Sing-along with your fun favorites as well as some new songs that will make you dance. Episodes include such series as Storybots, Badanamu Pop Videos, Como POP, DJ Monkey, Urban Tails, Fluffy's Rhyme Time, Dance Fever and ZooMoo Groove.

programme.desc: Stacy and Bradley go through Dill's anatomy. / Stacy and Bradley are teased by their classmates.

programme.title: Stickin' Around: Hold it! / Journey to the Center of Stacy's Closet
programme.desc: Bradley drinks a six-pack of pop. / Stacy and Bradley go spelunking.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie: Hedgie Sing Along / Hedgie Puddles

programme.title: Pins and Nettie: Hedgie Birthday / Hedgie Highway
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie have been invited to the birthday party of one of their hedgie friends. / Pins and Nettie love exploring and wandering along the Hedgehog Highway. But today there's a new door and the hedgies don't know what to make of it!

programme.title: Mortified: Taylor's Self-Portrait

programme.desc: The DaVinci's bring home an abandoned gargoyle statue from Notre Dame Cathedral which gives Pablo the heebie-jeebies! Meanwhile, Quba travels to Paris to Spray Alive the cathedrals gargoyles to carry

programme.title: Chaplin: The dunks of wrath / The saleswoman / Not fast and not furious !

programme.title: The Secret Life of Toys: Queen Raisin / Balthazar in Beamland
programme.desc: Raisin decides it's her turn to be queen. / It's up to Balthazar to save Rugby from Beamland.

programme.title: Invention Story: Cry Bunncle
programme.desc: Kit make test with his last invention, the Electromagnet Nail-Puller, that will save carpenters time and labour! But something is wrong and Hopner and Buggy make fun of Kit.

programme.title: Invention Story: Crash Test Bunny
programme.desc: Kit has a group of inventions that need testing, but some of them are very dangerous.

programme.desc: Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porters and Breakfast!

programme.desc: Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert!

programme.title: Maurice Sendak’s Little Bear: Building a House for Emily / Emily Returns / Little Sherlock Bear
programme.desc: Little Bear makes a house for Emily. / Emily comes for the summer. / A pie Mother Bear made goes missing.

programme.title: Maurice Sendak’s Little Bear: Cat's Short Cut / Little Bear's Bad Day / Captain Little Bear
programme.desc: Little Bear picks berries for a pie. / Little Bear has an accident-prone day. / Little Bear and friends play pirate.

programme.desc: Zou and Elzee borrow a tent from Grandpa and set it up in the garden.

programme.title: Play it for me Kooki / Sleep on a Cloud
programme.desc: Kooki is a wacky, peppy red panda who LOVES to make things. She babbles away in her own special language, but that’s okay, as each episode is narrated by a special little friend (who also helps translate). Every show has Kooki making two different things - from big, fun cardboard cutout creations to small, delightful handiworks. Whatever she’s doing, she’s always having fun and will inspire kids to unleash the wild side of their creativity.

programme.title: It's Cold Out There / Birds in a Tree

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Ginger'' - A young Terrier mix might be the best friend a nine-year-old boy has been hoping for. But Brandon is in for a lot of work if he's going to transform this untrained dog into a well-mannered family member that's good with power tools, hoverboards, and cats.

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia
programme.desc: ''World Champion Pesto'' - Genoa, Italy. Josh explores the culture and cuisine of this historic Mediterranean port.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Ano Nuevo State Park'' - Host Jeff Corwin travels to the protected beaches of California to witness the amazing breeding grounds of the mighty elephant seals.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Fiona'' - A family reaches out to Brandon in hopes of finding a companion for their current dog. Brandon thinks he may have a good match. But before the adoption is sealed, he'll have to make sure that Fiona is tested with kids and the family's dog.

programme.title: Animal Empires

programme.title: Dangerous Flights | Turn and Burn
programme.desc: Cory Bengtzen walked away from a lucrative car dealership to embark on a risky new career path: a used airplane delivery business. So far, it's beginning to look like a crash and burn endeavor. On the company's inaugural missions, two trans-global "ferry flights" over unforgiving waters, he and his team of daring cowboy pilots encounter wild weather, dangerous airstrips, and a series of mechanical failures. Enter the cockpit and see if this new business will finally take off, or if Cory's on a disaster collision course.

programme.title: Dangerous Flights | Fuel Critical
programme.desc: Dense jungles, steep learning curves, and big personalities cause turbulence and tension during two pressure-filled aircraft deliveries. Jump into the cockpit with owner Cory Bengtzen and co-pilot Kerry McCauley as they try to find their feet as a team while flying over the Amazon rainforest. Then follow pilot Randy McGehee on a U.N. relief mission to war-ravaged South Sudan, aboard a 1998 Dornier. It's a plane Randy's never flown, and he has just 48 hours to master it before embarking on the 6,000-mile journey.
