programme.title: Atomic Apocalypse
programme.desc: One family fights for survival in the hellish landscape two years after the nuclear apocalypse.

programme.title: The Magnificent Bodyguards
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as a kung fu master hired to safely escort a princess and her sickly brother through a treacherous region plagued by crime.

programme.title: Robot Ninja
programme.desc: A scientist helps a comic-book artist to become the superhero he has created in order to battle a vicious gang of criminals.

programme.title: Message from Space: Galactic Wars - Farewell, Heroes of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The heroes face off against Roxair for the final time to try to restore peace to their planets.

programme.title: Strike Commando
programme.desc: An American soldier is sent back to the jungle for a reconnaissance mission, only to find his helpers massacred by a brutal Russian soldier.

programme.title: Day 13
programme.desc: A teenager spending the summer babysitting his sister develops a crush on a neighbor girl, but quickly learns of her sinister home life.

programme.title: Nine
programme.desc: "NINE" is a vibrant and provocative musical that follows the life of world famous film director Guido Contini (Daniel Day-Lewis) as he reaches a creative and personal crisis of epic proportion, while balancing the numerous women in his life including his wife (Marion Cotillard), his mistress (Penélope Cruz), his film star muse (Nicole Kidman), his confidant and costume designer (Judi Dench), a young American fashion journalist (Kate Hudson), the whore from his youth (Stacy "Fergie" Ferguson) and his mother (Sophia Loren). The original 1982 Broadway production of "NINE," nominated for twelve Tony Awards and winning five, including Best Musical, was directed by Tommy Tune, choreographed by Thommie Walsh, starred Raúl Juliá with music and lyrics by Maury Yeston and book by Arthur Kopit. The 2003 Broadway revival of "NINE" received eight Tony Award nominations and won two, including Best Revival of a Musical.

programme.title: About Alex
programme.desc: 'About Alex' is the story of seven college friends who reunite over a three-day weekend, after one of them attempts suicide. When the friends get together to keep an eye on Alex, the weekend that ensues will renew old crushes and resentments, shine light on bad decisions, and ultimately push friendships and relationships to the brink as the group tries to speculate when the simple life of their college years turned so muddy and complex. Sometimes irreverent, sometimes poetic, and always moving, About Alex is a searingly honest look at the changing nature of adult friendship in the Facebook/Twitter generation.

programme.title: Faults
programme.desc: Claire is under the grip of a mysterious new cult called Faults. Desperate to be reunited with their daughter, Claire's parents recruit one of the world's foremost experts on mind control, Ansel Roth.

programme.title: The Private Lives of Pippa Lee
programme.desc: After nearly two decades caught under the wing of an aging husband (Alan Arkin), devoted mother and housewife Pippa Lee (Robin Wright) undergoes a midlife breakthrough. Unearthing the sexually curious wild child of her teens (as portrayed by Blake Lively), Pippa sparks a relationship with a kindred soul (Keanu Reeves). Robin Wright delivers a stunning and revelatory performance in Pippa Lee a wry, moving, and complex portrait of the many lives behind a single name.

programme.title: All Things to All Men
programme.desc: A thief is caught up in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse between a maverick cop and London crime boss.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: During her first night on the job, a rookie EMT and her partner pick up a wounded superhero and are pulled into his mission to save Los Angeles from a sinister organization.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: In Harms Way
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Preminger’s epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: His mother (Angela Lansbury) expects him to climb the corporate ladder. But Elvis would rather wear an aloha shirt than a white collar, so he goes to work as a tour guide. Lucky Elvis: his first customers are a car full of cuties.

programme.title: The Summer of Ben Tyler
programme.desc: In the deep South in the 1940s, an up-and-coming young lawyer finds the courage to make a difficult moral decision with the help of his family, especially a young, mentally handicapped black man that they have adopted.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: Anne Heche and Tate Donovan star in an adaptation of Luanne Rice's Christmas tale about a widower who finds love in New York City. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith
programme.desc: The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Plainsong
programme.desc: Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: Foxfire
programme.desc: A mountain woman thinks of selling her prized land, and seeks advice from the spirit of her dead husband. Stars Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn and John Denver. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Tulip Fever
programme.desc: An artist falls for a married woman while painting her during the Tulip mania of 17th century Amsterdam.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Tells the intriguing and highly seductive story behind one of Vermeer’s greatest and most enigmatic paintings.

programme.title: Stonehenge Apocalypse
programme.desc: A disgraced scientist discovers unusual spikes in the Earth's electromagnetic field emanating from Stonehenge.

programme.title: Super Storm
programme.desc: Epic storms obliterate cities, and a small-town teen's science project might be the answer to saving the world

programme.title: Super Hybrid
programme.desc: A car is brought to the impound garage after a deadly traffic accident, but the car has a mind of its own.

programme.title: Crossed Over
programme.desc: This is the true story of the deep and healing friendship between a grieving mother, Beverly Lowry (Diane Keaton), and death row inmate, Karla Faye Tucker (Jennifer Jason Leigh).

programme.title: The Couple
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a Jewish Hungarian's desperate attempts to save his family from Nazi death camps.

programme.title: Thanksgiving With the Carter's
programme.desc: The tale of a family that believes the season of gratitude isn't complete unless you surprise your loved ones with something positive and unique.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran living in the North struggles with his son's muteness and the hate of the Northerners.

programme.title: Abduction of Angie
programme.desc: Paramedic Miranda faces an emergency of her own when her 8-year-old daughter Angie is kidnapped by Miranda's estranged father.

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all destroys the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs the wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In hopes of wooing a girl, Tristan promises to bring her a falling star. He soon discovers the star is actually a celestial beauty named Yvaine. When an old witch Lamia attempts to steal Yvaine?s youth, Tristan must protect her.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Faces in the Crowd
programme.desc: A woman with "face-blindness" is unable to identify a serial killer after surviving an attack.

programme.title: Battle of Kings: Bannockburn
programme.desc: This graphic docu-drama tells the story of the pivotal campaign of Scotland's King Robert the Bruce against King Edward II of England, culminating in the Battle of Bannockburn in 1314.

programme.title: Avenging Angelo
programme.desc: A woman discovers she is the daughter of a murdered mafia chieftain and seeks revenge with the aid of her father's faithful bodyguard (Academy Award nominee Sylvester Stallone, "Rocky").

programme.title: Blunt Force Trauma
programme.desc: In the seedy underground dueling culture of South America, two opponents wearing Kevlar vests face each other, draw and shoot. With Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Sacrifice
programme.desc: A undercover cop inadvertently gets involved in a heroin ring when a young defector of the drug trade leaves his 5-year-old sister in his care. Starring Cuba Gooding Jr. and Christian Slater.

programme.title: American Warfighter
programme.desc: Rusty Wittenburg is a Navy SEAL struggling to balance his family life and his job. He fights daily to maintain the line between reality and the nightmares his PTSD conjures up for him.

programme.title: Elder
programme.desc: A Mormon missionary finds his world turned upside down when he falls in love with a handsome, Italian Communist. With original 8mm film Tom Clark recounts a love story on the coast of Italy.

programme.title: Bodega De Edgar
programme.desc: The courageous story of Edgar Torres immigrating to the US illegally with his father in the 80’s, becoming a wine expert and starting a winery in Paso Robles, CA to give his children a better future.

programme.title: Gotta Groove Records
programme.desc: A short film on the history and resurgence of vinyl records from the perspective of an artist focused pressing plant in Cleveland, Ohio. A hero story about grit, manufacturing and warm tones.

programme.title: Fine Lines
programme.desc: There is something far deeper that drives the world's most elite group of mountain adventurers to take life threatening risks while free climbing. At times brutally honest, other times pensive, these 20 legends of the vertical world share stories that reveal the triumph of the human spirit.

programme.title: Banking on Bitcoin
programme.desc: An ideological battle is underway between fringe utopists, mainstream capitalists, the curious public and angry regulators over Bitcoin, the most disruptive invention since the internet. BANKING ON BITCOIN explores this revolutionary technology and the players who are defining how it will shape our lives.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 1
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Meet the Patels
programme.desc: In this real-life "My Big Fat Greek Wedding,” an Indian-American man gets help from his parents and extended family so he can start looking for a wife the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Welcome to Ouzville
programme.desc: Born in in the neighborhood of Ouzai, Ayad Nasser has a vision to revitalize a part of the city which was cut off by the Lebanese state after it became a safe haven for gangs. He brings in a team of street artists to colorfully paint the buildings and volunteers to clean up the neglected streets, so that his hometown could become a place to build dreams.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Interviews and never-before-seen footage highlight the incredible life of astronaut Neil Armstrong -- from his near-death experiences as a fighter pilot and test pilot to his historic Apollo 11 mission as the first man on the moon.

programme.title: The Carters Family Reunion
programme.desc: Erica Carter is looking forward to a relaxing Family Reunion on the 4th of July, when she discovers that the hosts of the event (her parents) are stuck out of town. It's up to Erica and her crazy aunt and uncle to step up and save the day.

programme.title: Stolen Lilies
programme.desc: Sandra Dennis, a social worker, whose daughter was a victim of human trafficking must race against the clock to find four girls trapped in a warehouse before they are shipped out of the country.

programme.title: 81 Days
programme.desc: In a widely used internet world, often times friends, family and even married couples, have major infidelity suspicions because of the suspected cheaters use of it. Tish has had it with her husband Andrew and his Facebook surfing. He lies all the time about his so-called FEMALE FRIENDS that are on Facebook, so, Tish retaliates in the Godliest way one could ever image. 81 DAYS is based on true life social media cheating events that sadly happens to many of us, each and every day.

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student
programme.desc: Sinclair John is a beautiful, troubled, young high school senior from Dominica. When her parents suspect she may have had something to do with her boyfriend's death, they ship her to America under the Foreign Exchange Student Program. While living with her new family, she wreaks havoc and it's up to Jackie to stop her.

programme.title: Thanksgiving With The Carters
programme.desc: A family tries to find common ground with its newest members, as they honor their tradition of Thanksgiving surprise, where each person attempts to surprise the family with something unique and positive.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.desc: Childhood friends Amy and Steve come home from their first semester of college for a relaxed winter break, but must navigate turbulent reunions, unspoken romance, and even an unplanned pregnancy. There's no place like home for the holidays!

programme.title: The Merry In-laws
programme.desc: After Alex gets engaged to Peter, she goes to meet his parents for the first time, not knowing they are actually Santa and Mrs. Claus.

programme.desc: A botched Christmas eve robbery leads to disaster for a police officer, an erratic photographer, his vindictively murderous fiancee and a strung-out mall Santa.

programme.desc: A couple falls crazy in love, only to break up right before all the big holiday parties.

programme.desc: A Russian ballet star who has defected is forced by a twist of fate back to the USSR.

programme.desc: An eccentric cable news producer schemes to keep his ex-wife and best reporter on the job.
